content: easy does it cabled era instructions materials cast on 13 stitches set-up row ws p6 pm k1 pm p6 yarn 550 yards of dk weight yarn proceed to row 2 of increases sample made with 2 skeins of mirasol chusku needle us 7 - 24 circular increase row notions cable needle 2 stitch markers row 1 3 5 ws p6 sm knit until next gauge and size marker sm p6 row 2 4 rs knit across 23st x 28 row per 4 row 6 rs c6b sm kfb knit to next marker approx 88 long and 12 deep sm c6f abbreviations repeat row 1-6 until you reach the last few yards k = knit of the 1st skein or just less than half of total p = purl yardage then proceed to decrease row ws = wrong side rs = right side kfb = knit into the front & back of stitch decrease row k2tog = knit two stitches together row 1 3 5 ws p6 sm knit until next c6b = put the next 3 stitches onto a cable needle and hold to the back of your work knit marker sm p6 the next three row 2 4 rs knit across stitches then knit the three stitches on the row 6 rs c6b sm k2tog knit to next marker cable needle c6f = put the next three stitches onto a cable sm c6f needle and hold to the front of your work knit repeat row 1-6 of decreases until you have 13 the next 3 stitches then knit the three stitches stitches remaining repeat row 1-5 once more from the cable needle sm - slip marker pm = place marker cast off weave in ends darnknitanyway com ©2024 darn knit anyway all rights reserved this is a free pattern stillwater mn 651-342-1386 we hope you make beautiful crochet items for yourself or your loved ones
